title: Czech Republic
summary: The Czech Republic,[lower-alpha 1][11] also known by its short-form name Czechia[lower-alpha 2][12] and formerly known as Bohemia,[13] is a landlocked country in Central Europe. It is bordered by Austria to the south, Germany to the west, Poland to the northeast, and Slovakia to the east.[14] The Czech Republic has a hilly landscape that covers an area of 78,871 square kilometers (30,452 sq mi) with a mostly temperate continental and oceanic climate.
